About Us

Indigenous Nigerian Company Focusing on Excellence

Ciscon is an indigenous Nigerian company which provides various products and technical services to the petroleum industry. At Ciscon, we focus on excellence. In addition to this, we have employed proven business strategies, which distinguish our quality of services.

80+ Years Combined Experience

Management team with over 80 years of combined oil field experience.

Quality Management

ISO 9001:2001 quality management certification for high standards.

100+ Skilled Professionals

With a staff strength of over 100 professionals in their respective fields.

In 3 Continents

Operating from 3 Countries in 3 Continents - Nigeria, Saudi Arabia and USA.

Learn More About Us
Our Services

Comprehensive Services in the Oil & Gas Industry

We provide a wide range of technical services and products to meet the needs of our clients in the petroleum industry.

Geological Services

We provide comprehensive geological services including well site geology, mud logging, regional geology, reservoir modelling and geological consulting.

Learn More

Casing & Tubular Services

Our Casing & Tubular services include Our range of tubular services includes Casing and Tubing make up and break-out, with sizes from 1" to 36" OD.

Learn More

Well Completions

Ciscon offers a complete array of Well Completion Services including intelligent Completion Designs, Liner Hanger, Slickline Services, Equipment and Installation.

Learn More

Machine Shop Services

Our state-of-the-art Machine Shop offers a wide range of services with the lathe, drilling, cutting, grinding and rolling machines.

Learn More

Tools Rental Services

At Ciscon,Our Tool Rentals Unit has a well-diversified inventory to meet the demands of the Oil and Gas industry.

Learn More

Hydrohammer Services

Ciscon Hydrohammer Services uses a state-of-the-art hydraulic pile driving system known as the S90 Hydrohammer to drive conductors and pipe into the earth to create a foundation for a new oil or gas well.

Learn More
View All Services
